name: Truist Financial Corporation
summary: Truist Financial Corporation is a leading American bank holding company formed in 2019 through the merger of BB&T and SunTrust Banks. Headquartered in Charlotte, North Carolina, Truist is the tenth-largest bank in the United States by assets, providing a full range of consumer and commercial banking, investment banking, securities brokerage, asset management, mortgage, and insurance services across 15 states and Washington, D.C.
